snippet: Harlem Lanes, which opened in 2006 to great fanfare, was to shut down on Sunday, joining other popular local venues that closed because of economic difficulties.
abstract: Harlem Lanes, which opened in 2006 to great fanfare, was to shut down on Sunday, joining other popular local venues that closed because of economic difficulties.

headline.main: As Harlem Lanes Closes, a Common Neighborhood Refrain
